messages.message: I am really excited about today's class!
I'm glad to hear that. Let's make it a productive session.
Lately, I have been feeling a little overwhelmed with assignments.
I understand. It's okay to feel that. We can work through it together.
Thank you. That makes me feel more supported.
You are doing well. Small consistent steps will help.
I completed the practice exercises and I feel more confident.
That's excellent! Your effort is showing great results.
I still struggle sometimes when problems get harder though.
Struggling is part of learning. You are progressing well. Keep going.
